fields.name: require_dob
fields.label: Date of birth is required for 1+1 and 2+2 results
fields.subtext: The individual"s date of birth must be matched in one source for 1+1 and 2+2 results to be achieved

fields.name: mortality_check
fields.label: Mortality check
fields.subtext: Selecting this option means that the check will fail if a mortality result is found

fields.name: requires_address_on_all_matches
fields.label: Address is required for 1+1 and 2+2 results
fields.subtext: The individual"s address must be matched in every source for 1+1 and 2+2 results to be achieved

fields.name: run_original_address
fields.label: Use the original address if the normalized address fails

fields.name: whitelisted_databases
fields.label: Use only selected database names for the check
fields.subtext: This will override the default settings
